Tibet. I thought it was still on the North American continent. Thanks for 
clearing that up for me.)

From:   <KSLawdogg@c...>

(Cyber, you're wrong. The Ark crashed into Mt. St. Hillary in Oregon. NOT
Washington State. And somehow with magic, the Maximal leader moved the Ark
to Tibet...don't ask me how, but Hillary, not Helens. 'Cause for one, the
Autobots awoke in '84, not 1980 when Helens blew, so, sorry, you're wrong)
